question.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo> </mo><mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mover><mo>→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi></mover><mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mfenced><mover><mo>→</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow></mover><mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mfenced><mover><mo>→</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow></mover></math> white fumes, Metal. <math><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math> can be:

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r </mi><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math>

solution.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo> </mo><mo>&</mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math> can form nitrides which on hydrolysis form <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>NH</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math> <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">w</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>.</mo></math>
